== Ideas to implement OpenXML support ==

Existing open source library that can read write OpenXML:

 * [http://www.codeplex.com/ExcelPackage ExcelPackage], however this depends on .NET 3.0. We possibly can use the library implementation in Mono to fill the gap.
 * [http://www.codeproject.com/KB/office/excelxmllibrary.aspx ExcelXmlLibrary], the author expressed interest on implementing OpenXML support as well. The API of this library looks pretty good.
 * [http://www.codeproject.com/KB/office/OpenXML.aspx]
